title: 前端基础-移动端适配
content:
网易精品课移动端适配方案

小红书网页代码

<script>
  function setPixel() {
    var e = parseFloat(
      window
        .getComputedStyle(document.documentElement, null)
        .getPropertyValue("font-size")
    );
    function n() {
      var n = Math.min(60, (document.documentElement.clientWidth / 375) * 50);
      document.documentElement.style.fontSize = (n / e) * 16 + "px";
    }
    "boolean" != typeof window.isResponsive || window.isResponsive
      ? (n(),
        window.addEventListener(
          "orientationchange" in window ? "orientationchange" : "resize",
          n,
          !1
        ))
      : (document.documentElement.style.fontSize = "50px");
  }
  "undefined" != typeof window && setPixel();
</script>
